Intro:
Climate Action Network Zimbabwe (CAN Zimbabwe) is a non-governmental and not for profit organization. The Climate Action Network Zimbabwe (CANZIM) is a registered  coalition of civil society organisations in Zimbabwe interested or working on climate and developmental issues in Zimbabwe. CANZIM aims to be a powerful national  network of civil society organisations in Zimbabwe driving collective and sustainable action to fight the climate crisis and to achieve social and racial justice.  CANZIM targets to successfully implement radical and sustainable solutions across sectors, cities and communities.

System features:
✅ dashboard based interface where user login and access all the system modules via a dashboard, with dashboard working as the main window and subsequent modules working as child windows of the dashboard (SPA architecture)
✅ use tabs and headless modals where possible  so that we limit the number of modules or pages
✅ Fully responsive across all devices
✅ Brand-consistent colors throughout
✅ Minimalistic card layout with proper spacing
✅ Professional typography with size variations
✅ Single Page Application (SPA) dashboard: Real-time data updates, Performance optimization, Efficient data management, Customizable widgets, intuitive navigation, Interactivity (charts, filters, and date range selectors, drill down into data), Backend for Frontend (BFF) pattern
✅ Core architectural features: Client-side rendering, Decoupled front-end and back-end, API-first approach, Frameworks and libraries (Vue.js), State management, 
✅ Essential design features: Fast and smooth navigation, Responsive design, Dynamic content update, Consistent UI/UX, Caching and offline support, Meaningful animations and micro-interactions, Clear navigation (sidebar navigation, sticky headers, well-labeled buttons with icons), Effective error handling, Scalability, Load time management (lazy loading and code splitting to minimize the initial load time)

User Experience (UX) & Design Features:
- Intuitive, User-Friendly Interface: A clean, minimalist design with an easy-to-navigate visual hierarchy is essential for quick user adoption and high retention rates.
- Mobile Accessibility: Applications are designed with a mobile-first or responsive approach, ensuring full functionality and a seamless experience across desktops, tablets, and smartphones.
- Customization Options: Users can tailor aspects of the application, such as dashboards and workflows, to fit their specific business processes without affecting the core shared infrastructure.
- Data Visualization and Analytics: Built-in analytics and reporting tools provide users with real-time, actionable insights into their data and key performance metrics (KPIs).
- Seamless Onboarding & Support: Guided user onboarding and in-context support (like live chat or tooltips) help users quickly understand the product's value and reduce friction.
